attributes.action: Online fashion retailers display clothes on models ranging in all their sizes
attributes.background: Fashion retailers are only displaying their standard line of clothing items on models ranging only very slightly in UK sizes. Instead across all the models used on the website there should be an equal or similar number of each size of model that the clothing is sold in, on the website.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of retailers. If you would like retailers to be required to do this, you could start a new petition calling to Parliament to change the law.
